txt.en: Swift and nimble by nature, your war-steed is able to carry the load, allowing you to focus on the task at hand.

#1:[placeholder]: The following skills will enjoy shorter cooldowns: #1:{None|Keen Strike, Trick: Stratagem, All in the Wrist, Strategic Strike, and Jollification.[G]|Cry Havoc, Cry Wrath, Rally the Riders, and Rider is the Steed.[C]|Swift Cut, Sundering Blow, Destabilizing Strike, Recuperate, and Horn Blast.[H]|Serrated Edge, Clash of Arms, Pledge to Rohan, and Rohan's Edge.[U]|Flay Open, Seeking Arrow, Noble Arrow, Spread of Arrows, and Kill Shot.[T]|Mearas-lore, Radiant Burst, Bond of the Rider, and Sign of Power: Inspiration.[L]|Cry of the Eorlingas and Anthem of the Rohirrim/Riddermark/Red Dawn.[I]|Oration and Debate skills.[K]|Strike with Power, Clash of Steel and Will, Defence of the Eorlingas, Skill of the Eorlingas, Shield the Flank, Lancer's Charge, and Halt the Charge.[W]| Recuperate, Ferocious Roar[B]| Mocking Taunt and Take a Breath [R]|Sludge Pot, Pitch Pot, Explosive Brew, Waves of Grass, The Field of Celebrant, The Slaying of Scatha, Folca's Last Stand[O]}\n
